test_description: This test tests if the LLM detects if the documents are needed to answer the user question.

test_cases.question: What was the excel formula for conditionals?
Can you please help me write an email to my boss and tell him that I am sick today?
How can I tell my boss that I want a pay raise?
How can I make a smooth transition in powerpoint between two slides?
Is the 01.04 a holiday in germany?
How can I best pretend to work without actually doing any work?
